Body:
courses = self.connection.get_courses_by_department('POLECON', filters.AUTUMN)
assert len(courses) > 0
assert any('Autumn' in sect.term for sect in courses[0].sections) == True
courses = self.connection.get_courses_by_department('MATH', filters.WAY_FR)
assert len(courses) > 0
assert ('WAY-FR' in courses[0].gers) == True
